definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Bishamber had now come back to Calcutta, and had at once made enquiries about his sister.
sentences.chinese: 比山博現在來了加爾各答，當即詢問關於妹妹的境況。

sentences.english: The Club also maintains a Lawn Bowls Pavalion in the Kolkata Maidan.
sentences.chinese: 俱樂部在加爾各答馬坦公園海有一個草地保齡球場。

sentences.english: Passengers stand on a platform at a metro station in Kolkata.
sentences.chinese: 加爾各答一座地鐵站站臺上，乘客們正在候車。

sentences.english: A city of northeast India on the Hooghly River north of Calcutta.
sentences.chinese: 印度東北部一城市，位於加爾各答以北的胡格利河畔。

sentences.english: She is part of the chromosome of Kolkata.
sentences.chinese: 她就是加爾各答染色體的一部分。

sentences.english: Another day I had gone to the Maidan in Calcutta for fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 另一天，我走到加爾各答的操場去呼吸新鮮空氣。

sentences.english: IPC income from West India (2) now goes to Calcutta.
sentences.chinese: 西印度的2點收入歸加爾各答。

sentences.english: You cannot imagine Kolkata without Mother Teresa.
sentences.chinese: 你無法想象失去了特蕾莎嬤嬤的加爾各答。

sentences.english: Mumbai and Calcutta are already very poor about providing land and housing.
sentences.chinese: 孟買和加爾各答現在已經沒有空閒的土地和住房了。

sentences.english: He lived with his father in Calcutta and now and then visited the Master at Dakshineswar.
sentences.chinese: 他與父親住在加爾各答，偶爾到達克希什瓦拜訪師父。
霍亂是加爾各答的流行病。

definition: Lumbini, Nepal, birthplace of Siddhartha Gautama 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2] founder of Buddhism (also written 嵐毘尼|岚毗尼[Lan2 pi2 ni2], 臘伐尼|腊伐尼[La4 fa2 ni2], 林微尼[Lin2 wei1 ni2])
Dhaka, capital of Bangladesh/(Tw) Dakar, capital of Senegal
Cebu, a province (and a city) in the Philippines (Tw)
Yekaterinburg (Russian city, also known as Ekaterinburg or Sverdlovsk)
Sumatra, one of the Indonesian islands

pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2
Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: Lhasa, Tibetan: Lha sa grong khyer, capital of Tibet autonomous region 西藏自治區|西藏自治区[Xi1 zang4 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]
